titles.text: FAQs for MedCerts’ Online Healthcare & IT Certification Programs
Is Online Career Training Right For You?

This fun, online quiz takes just 3 minutes to complete and provides you with a personalized report to find out if short-term online career training is right for you. The report identifies your strengths and social style, plus the training and positions you’re best suited for.

“I am beyond excited to have found a program that not only helps further your education, but is also flexible enough to accommodate to your schedule. You don’t have to get your prerequisites out of the way and the program dives straight into the field you wish to build a career in.”

paragraphs: Is Short-Term Online Career Training Right for You?

MedCerts students exit their experience with a comprehensive, yet targeted education. Our online job certifications are considered dual or multi certification programs. Our career certifications will help you earn the credentials you need to start a new career and increase your earning potential.
MedCerts training programs are some of the most competitively price ways to start a new career.

This table is provided for reference only. Actual pricing may vary or change without notice. Pricing is based on an estimated full-cost tuition with fees for a Medical Assistant program or similar program before financial aid or other assistance. Data sampled from MedCerts, Oakland Community College, and Kaplan University.

The cost of MedCerts’ online certification training programs varies. While specific prices for each program are listed on their individual program pages, the pricing may range based on the program’s complexity and length. Entry-level programs could be around $2,000, whereas more advanced programs might be closer to $4,000.
Yes, MedCerts offers various payment options for their programs. These include paying in full at the time of enrollment, splitting payments over three months or extending payments over a year.
MedCerts supports several government grant programs, particularly for military personnel and their spouses. These include:

Generally, the programs are designed to be completed within a few months, with more advanced programs potentially taking longer. The exact duration depends on the specific program and the pace at which the student progresses.

MedCerts’ certification training programs are fully online and designed for remote learning, allowing students to progress at their own pace. The instructional design incorporates interactive elements, simulations, and expert instruction.

Yes, MedCerts includes exam fees and preparation materials in the program cost. Their courses are designed to prepare students to take and pass related certification exams. The programs integrate exam prep to align with certification objectives.

MedCerts’ online training programs stand out due to interactive and immersive learning experiences. Unlike traditional online courses that may rely heavily on video lectures and readings, MedCerts employs a variety of engaging instructional methods, including 3D animations and game-based learning.
